message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer, and I'm willing to let it go for $12,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $9,500 for it.
I understand you think it's pricey, but I've done some research and I'm confident it's worth more than you think. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $11,000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to pay $10,200 for it.
I see you're getting closer to my original price, but I'm still not willing to budge much. I'm willing to compromise at $11,500, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're trying to stick to your original price, but I'm still not comfortable with that. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for it.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you at $11,000, but that's my final compromise. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $10,900 for it.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, but I still want to make a deal. I'm willing to give you a slight discount, but I need to make at least $11,000 to break even. I'll meet you at $11,050, but that's as low as I can go.
I understand you're trying to break even, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for it, and that's my final offer.
